website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-assemble chair that rolls easily, creating a trouble-free shower experience for those with limited mobility.
pros: Opening in seat allows toilet use, and fits above a standard-sized commode
Caregivers like how easy it is to transport users from bed or wheelchair into this chair
cons: Height of chair cannot be adjusted
Users would like to see all four wheels lock, not just two

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Yikes! Bought this for my husband to use in the shower. He cannot put any weight on his right foot. Rusty, brownish-red water runs out from the bottom of the seat and puddles/ stains the shower floor!?! It is a shower chair!!! How can this be?
customer_reviews.author: Esther Lee

customer_reviews.title: Original wheels too small.  Plastic at bottom that wheel fits into keeps breaking & I keep repairing.  Poor design plastic not s
customer_reviews.text: Only two wheels lock, wheels not big enough. One of our wheels broken & we are unable to use it. Do you have replacement wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Price

customer_reviews.title: Works great for toilet to shower to bed transport
customer_reviews.text: A little high for my mother who is only 5 feet tall. So I took off about 1 1/2" in the legs and reconnected with 1 1/4" PVC couplings and it still clears the toilet! Works great for toilet to shower to bed transport.
customer_reviews.author: Fooky

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Shower Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy chair with comfortable split seat allows easy access to the "nether regions". Only two wheels lock so I took off one star as I still need to be extra careful getting on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Les A.

customer_reviews.title: Rolls VERY easily. It is a little tall so not suitable ...
customer_reviews.text: Well built. Rolls VERY easily. It is a little tall so not suitable for young teenager or person under 5'4".
customer_reviews.author: Joel Dobrzelewski

customer_reviews.title: Great and durable product
customer_reviews.text: Great and durable product. The only thing I don't care for is how easily it moves, even when the brakes are applied.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia mader

customer_reviews.title: a very good product.
customer_reviews.text: chair is very functional and makes showering so much easier. Just wish that they had put caster brakes on all four wheels as it has a tendency to move unexpectedly. overall, a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: roy shamblen

customer_reviews.title: Shower chair.
customer_reviews.text: One leg and still transfer from wheel chair to toilet and back. For me very sturdy and high seat is perfect as my left leg is longer than leg I used to have but no longer is it with me. All in all, a great chair.
customer_reviews.author: Boer58

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Have to keep seat completely up to glide over standard toilet but fits fine. Sturdy and comfortable. All wheels lock which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: no name

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower/toilet assist I've ever used. It's very easy to assemble, light weight and easy to roll around. Do be careful to measure your tub if that is where you need to use it. It doesn't fit in mine. It does fit the walk in shower very easily, though.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara E.

customer_reviews.title: Great shower chair!
customer_reviews.text: Works great - comfortable - tall enough - wide enough - dries easily- can use over toilet then roll right into the shower -
customer_reviews.author: MARSP

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Extremely easy to assemble and one of the best purchases we have made for my 96 year old mother. She feels safe and it is easy for her caregiver to shower her. The rollers are great and they all lock but they rotate. We solved that problem by just putting the chair against the shower wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda G.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Patient pleased with product an I am pleased with the pricing in comparison to other venders.
customer_reviews.author: Astrix M.

customer_reviews.title: it doesnt work and my patient is unable to safely get in or out of the chair unless the chair is against the wall or something s
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because it was everything expected except the most important part which were the brakes. it doesnt work and my patient is unable to safely get in or out of the chair unless the chair is against the wall or something sturdy. currently looking for replacement wheels/ casters
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but a bit tall for my little mother
customer_reviews.author: Robin Cates

customer_reviews.title: The toilet seat has seams on it
customer_reviews.text: This product is unsanitary. The padded toilet seat has seams in them with thread. As a result it can trap particles and cannot be sanitized. It seems like a boat cushion to me. I am not sure how this can be called a medical chair. Disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Michael DiPietro

customer_reviews.title: Good shower/toilet chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair because my wife was in a nursing home after a stroke. The facilities chairs were all defective so I bought our own. It worked great to get her to the toilet and shower. We are at home now and it is good for the toilet, but it does not fit in our shower. I hope the wheels hold up, they seem a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Elektronmann

customer_reviews.title: What to do?
customer_reviews.text: Water is accumulating in the seat. I assume it’s soaking in through the stitching
customer_reviews.author: Norman G. Troseth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mom mother loves it. Exactly what she and her caregivers wanted.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: The aids at the assisted living say the chair works fine in the shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a friend. The aids at the assisted living say the chair works fine in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product but wish all 4 wheels were locking and not just 2.
customer_reviews.author: Guli

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother is 93, about 250 lbs. this chair is very comfortable for her!! She loves it! Fits over 17” toilet! Very sturdy chair!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Bought this chair for elderly father with Parkinson's and very ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chair for elderly father with Parkinson's and very limited mobility. Even though the 2 wheels lock the chair moves because all four wheels spin. Could not use because chair slid/moved when father tried to sit down. I consider this chair a safety hazard. All four wheels should lock and in locked position the wheels should be prevented from rotating or spinning.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: ... my Mother take shower again after her stroke a wonderful gift for handicap
customer_reviews.text: It help my Mother take shower again after her stroke a wonderful gift for handicap person
customer_reviews.author: Mathias

customer_reviews.title: Just what Mom wanted
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my mom who has had a stroke.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl D.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth it! We can now early shower my father without a lot of hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Caregivers really like this chair and with modification to the back to fit in the shower, it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover, you’ll like it.
customer_reviews.text: Product is as advertised. My dogs love it and the couch stays clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sure Shot

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice well built and very sturdy chair. Only wish it had all four locking wheels and not just two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works out great for me
customer_reviews.text: The chair is exactly what I was looking for. Works out great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Farinacci

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: A bit uncomfortable, difficult to maneuver in and out of a 'roll in' shower.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever for disabled. Love it makes showers so ez!
customer_reviews.author: Trixie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for invalid mother. Can also be used as tioleting chair over toilet.
customer_reviews.author: JMC3

customer_reviews.title: Nice and heavy but not so handy!
customer_reviews.text: Had to send this back...it continued to roll even with the brake set. Much too frightening for an elderly person with a broken hip even with help.
customer_reviews.author: ggmomma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase...exactly what we were looking for. Hospice could not provide anything except a lightweight metal flimsy chair that was impossible for our caregivers to use. We ask for something better and they could not provide, so thankfully were fortunate enough to purchase our own. This would cost less to the state/government programs, but wonder why they offer just lousy items for the needy. Thank you to a great company for offering help at a reasonalbe price.
customer_reviews.author: mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only wish they make this chair with a head rest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: To big to fit into a regular shower and tube makeup is open and can fill with water.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa brown

product_meta.title: MJM International 118-3TW-SSDE Standard Shower Chair with Soft Seat, Royal Blue/Forest Green/Mauve
product_meta.description:
Shower chair 18" internal width, 3" rust proof threaded stem casters, with open front soft seat, 300 lbs Wt cap.

MANUFACTURER CONTACT INFORMATION
8002706199

categories: Bath & Shower Safety Seating & Transfer Benches
